reviews.author: Lesya Lyashenko
reviews.review: Mariya Farmagey is truly the best agent ever. She helped me sell my house $25,000 above listing price. She goes above and beyond to ensure a pleasant and smooth transaction. I will recommend her to all my friends and family for their real estate transaction needs.

reviews.author: Peter Nguyen
reviews.review: Do not recommend. Horrible service trying to conduct business with Mariya Vitalyevna. Very rude and condescending Take your business elsewhere.

reviews.author: Teresa Sanders
reviews.review: If you are looking for a realtor that will go the extra mile Weichert is the best!! Ask for Michelle she's absolutely fantastic!!

ownerResponse.text: Thank you for your kind review and we agree, Michelle DeKoekkoek is a fantastic agent!
Thank you!  We strive to always provide excellent customer care and appreciate your feedback.
Thank you for the positive rating!
